display_long_description:
# Your Physics Playground Awaits
In NervBox, physics is the foundation. Every player is physically simulated, giving you the ability to get into chaotic close-quarters fights or cooperate to muscle around oversized contraptions. Build elaborate creations, collapse them in spectacular fashion, or invent entirely new games just by experimenting with the world. From futuristic sports to chaotic chain reactions, NervBox gives you the world for imagination and physics to collide.

[media]


# Next-Gen Mod Streaming 
Jump in and spawn any community-made mod directly into your world, instantly. You’re not limited by what’s installed; you’re limited only by your creativity. Weapons, props, maps, even entire worlds: if it exists, you can play it in a click. And with NervWare, anyone can make and share their own creations — no modding experience required.

[media]

# Build Anything with the Sandbox Gun
Master the ultimate multitool: spawn anything, weld them all together, and bring your wildest ideas to life. Wield this power to construct epic battle arenas, design mind-bending parkour courses, or just hang out with friends while putting together new gizmos and gadgets.

[media]

# Join the Community
Why play solo when you can host or join public and private lobbies with up to 8 players? Bring your friends or make new ones! Want to shape the future of NervBox? Join our active Discord community to share your ideas, give us feedback, or even find groups to play with!
